CHAT.comment: Book Reading; The Very Hungry Caterpillar

Chi sits on Mot's lap with Mot holding book and Chi turning pages; Chi reads quite fluently , so there's not much feedback from Mot except for seeing if he has enough light in the beginning; Chi sees reading VHC as easy and is quite flippant about it

u.a: Chi sitting in Mot's lap . Mot holds book as Chi turns pages .
each syllable elongated and singsong; ironic
